issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Looks like ENIs attached to NATGWs may be missing the EIP association info and other information in the describe ENI request. Also filtering on this info ('addresses.association.public-ip') doesn't appear to be working with these ENIs.
Thanks, 
-M

EUCA describe with filters...
{code}
In [213]: eucaeni = user.ec2.connection.get_all_network_interfaces(filters={'addresses.association.public-ip':'10.116.131.182'})

In [214]: print eucaeni
[]
{code}

AWS describe with filters...
{code}
In [215]: awseni = awsuser.ec2.connection.get_all_network_interfaces(filters={'addresses.association.public-ip':'52.52.138.40'})[0]

In [216]: print awseni
NetworkInterface:eni-0cd9ff03
{code}

EUCA Describe request
{code}
In [221]: user.ec2.show_nat_gateways(gw)
[2016-10-17 17:28:18,027][INFO][EC2ops(admin:testrunner)]: 
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NatGateWayID: nat-3d1a840b0028e2f5f    CreateTime: 2016-10-14 19:41:55.372000+00:00            |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| VpcId:    vpc-53875675    PublicIp        NetworkInterfaceId  AllocationId       PrivateIp     |
| State:    available       10.116.131.182  eni-d974449c        eipalloc-3664258c  172.11.2.155  |
| SubnetId: subnet-89486e0e                                                                      |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+



In [222]: eni = user.ec2.connection.get_all_network_interfaces('eni-d974449c')[0]

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<DescribeNetworkInterfacesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2014-05-01/">
  <requestId>4b763617-4d54-41d3-b1ce-1b226af86084</requestId>
  <networkInterfaceSet>
    <item>
      <networkInterfaceId>eni-d974449c</networkInterfaceId>
      <subnetId>subnet-89486e0e</subnetId>
      <vpcId>vpc-53875675</vpcId>
      <availabilityZone>one</availabilityZone>
      <description>Interface for NAT Gateway nat-3d1a840b0028e2f5f</description>
      <ownerId>000442321870</ownerId>
      <requesterId>000136634802</requesterId>
      <requesterManaged>true</requesterManaged>
      <status>in-use</status>
      <macAddress>d0:0d:d9:74:44:9c</macAddress>
      <privateIpAddress>172.11.2.155</privateIpAddress>
      <sourceDestCheck>false</sourceDestCheck>
      <groupSet/>
      <attachment>
        <attachmentId>ela-attach-c384c137</attachmentId>
        <instanceOwnerId>eucalyptus</instanceOwnerId>
        <deviceIndex>1</deviceIndex>
        <status>attached</status>
        <deleteOnTermination>false</deleteOnTermination>
      </attachment>
      <privateIpAddressesSet>
        <item>
          <privateIpAddress>172.11.2.155</privateIpAddress>
          <primary>true</primary>
        </item>
      </privateIpAddressesSet>
    </item>
  </networkInterfaceSet>
</DescribeNetworkInterfacesResponse>

{code}



AWS Describe Request:
{code}
In [223]: awsuser.ec2.show_nat_gateways(natgw)
[2016-10-17 17:32:43,901][INFO][EC2ops()]: 
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NatGateWayID: nat-093ab72e6ea1f8467    CreateTime: 2016-10-18 00:05:24.884000+00:00 |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| VpcId:    vpc-5bb22c3e    NetworkInterfaceId  AllocationId       PrivateIp          |
| State:    pending         eni-0cd9ff03        eipalloc-7d512047  10.10.10.235       |
| SubnetId: subnet-e628a4bf                                                           |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+


awsuser.ec2.connection.get_all_network_interfaces('eni-0cd9ff03')[0]
?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<DescribeNetworkInterfacesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2014-05-01/">
    <requestId>65685e58-461d-4d58-a888-57766fb98fa0</requestId>
    <networkInterfaceSet>
        <item>
            <networkInterfaceId>eni-0cd9ff03</networkInterfaceId>
            <subnetId>subnet-e628aXXX</subnetId>
            <vpcId>vpc-5bb22XXX</vpcId>
            <availabilityZone>us-west-1c</availabilityZone>
            <description>Interface for NAT Gateway nat-093ab72e6ea1f8467</description>
            <ownerId>XXXXXXXXXXXXX</ownerId>
            <requesterId>XXXXXXXXXX</requesterId>
            <requesterManaged>true</requesterManaged>
            <status>in-use</status>
            <macAddress>06:f9:fd:b9:f6:24</macAddress>
            <privateIpAddress>10.10.10.235</privateIpAddress>
            <sourceDestCheck>false</sourceDestCheck>
            <groupSet/>
            <attachment>
                <attachmentId>ela-attach-4f22c826</attachmentId>
                <instanceOwnerId>amazon-aws</instanceOwnerId>
                <deviceIndex>1</deviceIndex>
                <status>attached</status>
                <deleteOnTermination>false</deleteOnTermination>
            </attachment>
            <association>
                <publicIp>52.52.138.40</publicIp>
                <publicDnsName/>
                <ipOwnerId>XXXXXXXXXXX</ipOwnerId>
                <allocationId>eipalloc-7d512047</allocationId>
                <associationId>eipassoc-1fa3b325</associationId>
            </association>
            <tagSet/>
            <privateIpAddressesSet>
                <item>
                    <privateIpAddress>10.10.10.235</privateIpAddress>
                    <primary>true</primary>
                    <association>
                        <publicIp>52.52.138.40</publicIp>
                        <publicDnsName/>
                        <ipOwnerId>XXXXXXXXXXXX</ipOwnerId>
                        <allocationId>eipalloc-7d512047</allocationId>
                        <associationId>eipassoc-1fa3b325</associationId>
                    </association>
                </item>
            </privateIpAddressesSet>
        </item>
    </networkInterfaceSet>
</DescribeNetworkInterfacesResponse>

{code}
fields.summary: ENIs attached to NATGWs are missing EIP association info, etc

comments.body:
The n4j nat gateway test is updated for the new behaviour:
https://github.com/eucalyptus/n4j/pull/29

Verified that all NAT Gateway ENI information is present:

{noformat}
Name        : eucalyptus
Version     : 4.4.0
Release     : 0.25765.135.20170124git1901656.el7
Architecture: x86_64
Install Date: Wed 25 Jan 2017 09:24:41 AM PST
{noformat}

{noformat}
# euca-create-nat-gateway -s subnet-5f1756e9 -a eipalloc-a0d52186NATGATEWAY	nat-d8f9d55959d776f48	pending	subnet-5f1756e9	vpc-b67fcc3f			2017-01-27T15:43:46.128Z	
NATGATEWAYADDRESSES	eipalloc-a0d52186			
# 
# euca-describe-nat-gateways nat-d8f9d55959d776f48
NATGATEWAY	nat-d8f9d55959d776f48	available	subnet-5f1756e9	vpc-b67fcc3f		2017-01-27T15:43:46.128Z	
NATGATEWAYADDRESSES	eipalloc-a0d52186	eni-beee5068	10.116.131.221	172.31.6.58
# 
# euca-describe-network-interfaces --filter association.public-ip=10.116.131.221
NETWORKINTERFACE	eni-beee5068	subnet-5f1756e9	vpc-b67fcc3f	000122946064	in-use172.31.6.58		false
ATTACHMENT		ela-attach-a378d008	1	attached		false
ASSOCIATION	10.116.131.221	000122946064	172.31.6.58
PRIVATEIPADDRESS	172.31.6.58		primary
# 
{noformat}

describe-network-interfaces response xml:
{code}
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<DescribeNetworkInterfacesResponse>
  <requestId>acbc6b1b-1dbf-4b28-8a10-329d20ee0349</requestId>
  <networkInterfaceSet>
    <item>
      <networkInterfaceId>eni-beee5068</networkInterfaceId>
      <subnetId>subnet-5f1756e9</subnetId>
      <vpcId>vpc-b67fcc3f</vpcId>
      <availabilityZone>one</availabilityZone>
      <description>Interface for NAT Gateway nat-d8f9d55959d776f48</description>
      <ownerId>000122946064</ownerId>
      <requesterId>000122946064</requesterId>
      <requesterManaged>true</requesterManaged>
      <status>in-use</status>
      <macAddress>d0:0d:be:ee:50:68</macAddress>
      <privateIpAddress>172.31.6.58</privateIpAddress>
      <sourceDestCheck>false</sourceDestCheck>
      <groupSet/>
      <attachment>
        <attachmentId>ela-attach-a378d008</attachmentId>
        <instanceOwnerId>eucalyptus</instanceOwnerId>
        <deviceIndex>1</deviceIndex>
        <status>attached</status>
        <deleteOnTermination>false</deleteOnTermination>
      </attachment>
      <association>
        <publicIp>10.116.131.221</publicIp>
        <ipOwnerId>000122946064</ipOwnerId>
        <allocationId>eipalloc-a0d52186</allocationId>
        <associationId>eipassoc-a1b1c462</associationId>
      </association>
      <tagSet/>
      <privateIpAddressesSet>
        <item>
          <privateIpAddress>172.31.6.58</privateIpAddress>
          <primary>true</primary>
          <association>
            <publicIp>10.116.131.221</publicIp>
            <ipOwnerId>000122946064</ipOwnerId>
            <allocationId>eipalloc-a0d52186</allocationId>
            <associationId>eipassoc-a1b1c462</associationId>
          </association>
        </item>
      </privateIpAddressesSet>
    </item>
  </networkInterfaceSet>
</DescribeNetworkInterfacesResponse>
{code}
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
